attributes.action: Call an emergency parliment meeting to tackle Knife Crime in the UK!
attributes.background: With all the focus on Brexit, it seems knife crime within parliment is being brushed under the carpet! Something needs to done to tackle knife immediately! Around 20 stabbings have taken place in london alone already this year! Introduce tougher sentances for carrying and more stop searches!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "an emergency Parliament meeting".

The Petitions Committee has scheduled a debate on a petition calling for longer sentences for knife crime on 25th March. You can sign that petition and watch the debate here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233926
